mapper.insert: insert into reservation ( reservationID, phoneNumber, email, parkingLotID, carSize, reservationTime, entranceTime, exitTime, cardNumber, cardExpirationMonth, cardExpirationYear, cardValidationCode, cardHolder ) values ( #{reservationId}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{parkingLotID}, #{carSize}, #{reservationTime}, #{entranceTime}, #{exitTime}, #{cardNumber}, #{cardExpirationMonth}, #{cardExpirationYear}, #{cardValidationCode}, #{cardHolder} )
mapper.select: select reservationId from reservation where phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}
select reservationID, phoneNumber, email, parkingLotID, carSize, reservationTime, entranceTime, exitTime from reservation where reservationID = #{reservationId} and phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}
mapper.delete: delete from reservation where reservationID = #{reservationId} and phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}
mapper.update: update reservation set phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email}, parkingLotID = #{parkingLotID}, carSize = #{carSize}, reservationTime = #{reservationTime}, entranceTime = #{entranceTime}, exitTime = #{exitTime} where reservationId = #{reservationId}
